item.title: PayPal Expands BNPL Partnership As KKR Agrees To Buy Up To €65 Billion In European Loan Receivables
item.description: The new deal also includes a replenishing loan commitment of up to €6 billion.

item.title: Fundstrat’s Tom Lee Predicts Ethereum Likely To Hit Bottom This Week
item.description: Lee said Ethereum’s valuation metrics, like assets locked on-chain and long-term ratios to Bitcoin, indicate it may be nearing a bottom.

item.title: Why Did Nuvalent Stock Surge 15% Today?
item.description: The company announced strong topline results from its ALKOVE-1 Phase 1/2 trial, evaluating its investigational drug Neladalkib.
